title: S14 Ep82: The Holzer Files
itunes:title: The Holzer Files
description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS reopens The Holzer Files today! A look at the life, death and paranormal research of legendary investigator Dr. Hans Holzer.

Today we are joined by the entire cast of The Holzer Files from Travel Channel's New Series! Join Alexandra Holzer, Cindy Kaza, Shane Pittman, Gabe Roth and Dave Schrader as they give insights into the man, his work and long last contributions to the field of paranormal research.

Listen to the show but watch the new series every Thursday on Travel Channel.
https://www.travelchannel.com/shows/holzer-files

Support our sponsors for great deals!
